reference.shortdesc: An index-see-also element directs the reader to an index entry that the reader should use in addition to the current one.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: There can be multiple index-see-also elements within a single indexterm element.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: Processors should ignore an index-see-also element if its parent indexterm element contains any indexterm children.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Examples
example.p: This section contains examples of how index-see-also elements can be used.
